cartegroy1.description1: Work with your contractor to develop a realistic timeline that includes all phases of the renovation, from demolition to final touches

cartegroy2.description1: Look for licensed and insured plumbers with good reviews. Ask friends and family for recommendationsdemolition to final touches.

cartegroy3.description1: Keep in touch with your contractor and plumber to ensure everyone is on the same page and any issues are addressed promptly with good reviews.
